snippet.title: Horizon Forbidden West: Burning Shores | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Horizon Forbidden West: Burning Shores launches April 19 on PS5! This expansion sees Aloy pursue a sinister threat in the untamed wilds of Los Angeles, now a treacherous volcanic archipelago.

Learn more: https://www.playstation.com/games/horizon-forbidden-west/burning-shores 

©2023 Sony Interactive Entertainment Europe. Developed by Guerrilla. Horizon Forbidden West is a registered trademark or trademark of Sony Interactive Entertainment LLC.
